document_data.name: Dackto
document_data.mainbody: '''Dackto''' was a [[Maztican]] [[drider]]. He was one of the [[Ancient Ones]].
document_data.History:
In [[1361 DR]], after the [[Night of Wailing]], Dackto was one of the many drow who survived and were transformed into driders by [[Lolth]].

He died at the hands of the [[Itza]] during the advance of [[Darien]]'s army of [[giant ant]]s.
